content: Queen Ragnhild, tasked with assisting King Erik, greets him elegantly, and inquires about his orders. When he responds that he has no orders for the day, she offers to discuss any matter that interests him. King Erik proceeds to ask her about herself, whereafter she reveals her happiness in their relationship and appreciation for his leadership. She further discloses her age of 16 years and how she grew up under a guardian before meeting King Erik. Throughout the conversation, Queen Ragnhild displays admiration and warmth towards King Erik while fulfilling her responsibilities as an assistant by attending to his needs.
